$description: Overlay and alpha color primitives for semi-transparent UI elements like modal backdrops and state backgrounds.

overlay.$description: Overlay colors for modal backdrops and similar semi-transparent backgrounds.

light.$description: Light theme overlay (50% opacity). Use for: modal backdrops, drawer overlays on light backgrounds.

dark.$description: Dark theme overlay (75% opacity). Use for: modal backdrops on dark backgrounds, higher contrast overlays.

alpha.$description: Semi-transparent state colors for component backgrounds. These are theme-agnostic base values - use semantic tokens for theme-aware colors.
